meta.description: Determine the optimal number of acres to use for small and large oil wells to maximize oil production under constraints on drill bits and pollution.

params.name: production_per_acre
params.description: Barrels of oil produced per acre by each type of well

params.name: pollution_per_acre
params.description: Units of pollution produced per acre by each type of well

params.name: drill_bits_per_acre
params.description: Drill bits required per acre by each type of well

vars.name: acres
vars.description: Acres of land used for each type of well

constraints.name: drill_bits_constraint
constraints.description: Total drill bits used cannot exceed available drill bits

constraints.name: pollution_constraint
constraints.description: Total pollution produced cannot exceed maximum allowable pollution

constraints.name: land_constraint
constraints.description: Total acres used cannot exceed available land
